title: Omne Trium Perfectum - I
description:
Sam, Luke, and Kal talk about the Trinity, Christopher Langan, the Cognitive Theoretical Model of the Universe (CTMU), and Unbound Telesis (UBT).

Christopher Langan
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christopher_Langan#:~:text=Langan%20has%20developed%20an%20idea,universe%20in%20the%20same%20phrase%22.

CTMU - Cognitive Theoretical Model of the Universe
http://ctmucommunity.org/wiki/Cognitive-Theoretic_Model_of_the_Universe

UBT - Unbound telesis
http://ctmucommunity.org/wiki/UBT
